scripts.test-plt-testrail: npm run pretest && npm run plt-testrail -c _build
scripts.test-plt: npm run pretest && npm run plt -c _build
scripts.test-lek: npm run pretest && npm run lk -c _build
scripts.plt-testrail: playwright test setup-testrun.spec.ts && playwright test tests/plt-BYOE --config=main.config.ts
scripts.plt: playwright test erase-testrun.spec.ts && playwright test tests/plt-BYOE --config=main.config.ts
scripts.lk: playwright test erase-testrun.spec.ts && playwright test  tests/lk-BYOE --config=main.config.ts
